Eris' Evil Thoughts:
Has your search for the truth about Embryo been answered? One thing I know for sure is that Jude van Etina stole Solina's power and disappeared long ago in the name of Embryo...and Embryo continues to be active even now.
The three seals that have risen prove this fact to be true. Please, you must investigate the truth about Embryo. The world needs to know!
"Huh? What?"
